articles.title: Argentina inflation soars past 100% mark - BBC
articles.description: Inflation hits triple digits for the first time since the period of hyperinflation in the early 1990s.
articles.content:
Argentina's inflation rate has soared past 100% for the first time since the end of hyperinflation in the early 90s.
Inflation hit 102.5% in February, the country's statistics agency said, meaning t… [+1705 chars]
